subsection.title: Quality Standards
subsection.content: - All animations must be GPU-accelerated for smooth performance - Motion preferences must be respected (prefers-reduced-motion) - Animations must enhance UX without being distracting - Consistent animation timing and easing across components - All interactive elements must have appropriate hover/focus animations
